description: Oriental eau de parfum. The fragrance pyramid reveals notes of orange, amber and evernyl. It’s a warm, elegant and luminous fragrance.
name: for-him-red-edition-edp-50ml---1-69-oz

description:
A fragrance that takes the iconic original perfume to a new level of refinement.

The vibrant citrus notes of bergamot and grapefruit contrast with a rich woody and spicy signature that creates a unique and powerful aroma.
Completing this sophisticated essence, a trio of Amber, Tonka and Black Vanilla adds a reinvented addiction, revealing a deeper fascination.

A story of greater intensity, bold sensuality and an irresistible appeal for those who are reshaping the boundaries of masculinity.
name: for-him-red-edition-intense-parfum-100-ml---3-38-oz

description: Eau de parfum. A fragrance that takes the iconic original scent to a new level of refinement. Completing this sophisticated essence, a trio of Amber, Tonka and Black Vanilla adds a reinvented addiction, revealing a deeper fascination. A story of greater intensity, bold sensuality and an irresistible appeal for those who are reshaping the boundaries of masculinity.
